We are pleased to appoint you in the services of {{ doc.company }} on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%} {{ row.offer_term }}: {{ row.value }}

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

{% if terms_exist %}
{{ doc.terms }}

MR. {{doc.applicant_name }}

Address:_______

Dear {{doc.applicant_name }}

On Behalf of Finest Tech Solution Pvt. Limited. I am pleased to offer you the full time employment for the position of {{doc.designation }} at Finest Tech Solution Pvt. Limited with a start date of{{ doc.offer_terms}} You are required to report to HR Department for your joining formalities.

Your Total CTC will be Rs._____ - per month.

Please ensure that you bring in the following documents on the first day of your joining:

1. Six passport size colored photographs.

2. Photocopy of Photo ID & Address Proof ( Aadhar Card/ Pan Card)

3. Photocopy of education certificates.

4. A proof of resignation/ resignation letter/ acceptance proof from the previous employer.

ANKYLOSING SPONDYLYTIS

Previous Next


Problem

Ye ek tarah ka gathiya hai jo reed ki haddi or sharir ke bade jodon ko affect karta hai.

Symptoms

  • Joints mein pain rahega
  • Sidha chala nai jayega
  • Jhuk ke chala jayega

Top Reasons

  • No specific cause for this disease

Co- Relation

  • Hamari medicine Ayurvedic jadi butiyo se bani hai jo aapki body ki rogo se ladne ki shakti badha degi aur ye pareshani aapki bilkul theek ho jayegi
  • Immunity badhne se aapki allergy ki problem theek ho jayegi
  • Ye aapke celluar level pe kaam karegi aur cells so strong bnayegi.
  • Hamari medicine aapki body me jama hui gandgi ko nikaal degi jis se aapko aage bhi koi bimari nai hogi.
  • Ye aapke sharir me nutrition ki kami ko pura karegi jis se aapke sare organs achhe se kaam karenge.
  • Hormone level maintain karegi jis se aapko kabhi bhi hormones se related koi problem nai hogi.
  • Ye aapka digestion achha karegi jis se aap jo bhi khaoge aapki body ko uska pura nutrition milega.
  • Ye aapki Immunity ko badha dega jo virus and bacterial infection se bachayega. Kabhi bhi mausam change hone ki wajah se ki viral ya infection nai hoga.
  • Ye aapka Blood Circulation maintain rakhega aur blood me jama hui gandagi ko saaf karegi.
  • Ye aapke sabhi Body organs, cells pe kaam karegi.
  • Ye multivitamins ke roop mein bhi kaam Karegi jo aapki muscles and bones ko supplement provide Karegi

Questions to be asked:

  • Ye pareshani aapko kitne saal se hai?
  • Kya iske liye koi test karaya hai?/Kya kisi doctor ko consult kia hai?
  • Kya report kisi doctor ko dikhayi hai?
  • Doctor ne kya bola?
  • Iske liye koi medicine le rahe ho?
  • Ek din mein kitni tablet khate ho?

Other Symptoms:

  • Aapka pet theek se saaf hota hai?
  • Khana digest ho jata hai
  • Gas/Acidity toh nai rehti
  • Neend theek se aati hai

Other Disease:

  • Kya aapko iske alawa koi aur pareshani toh nahi hai jaise BP, Sugar, Thyroid ya koi aur pareshani?
Previous History
  • Kya aapko pehle kabhi Jaundice ya malaria hua hai?
  • Kya koi Injury (Chot) ya operation toh nahi hua?

Diet & Lifestyle:

  • Kya main jaan sakti/sakta hu ke aap subah se sham tak diet me kya lete hain?
  • Kya aap apni diet mein fruits and vegetable salad lete hain?
  • Kya main jaan sakta/sakti hu ke aap kya job karte ho?
  • Kya aap koi exercise/Yoga/walk karte ho?

Tests:

  • RBT – Routine Blood Test

Treatment
Dr. Shuddhi Package – Rs. 4200/-
name: Test
